name: Elite Residence Dahab
description: Located in Dahab, Elite Residence is connected to a shopping center, a 1-minute drive from Dahab Beach and 5 minutes from Dahab Lagoon. This hotel is 1.2 mi (2 km) from Asala Beach and 3.1 mi (5 km) from Dahab Bay. Pamper yourself with onsite massages or enjoy recreation amenities such as bicycles to rent. Additional features at this hotel include tour/ticket assistance and a banquet hall. Getting to the surf and sand is a breeze with the beach shuttle (surcharge). Grab a bite from the snack bar/deli, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Relax with a refreshing drink at one of the 20 beach bars. Local cuisine breakfasts are available daily from 8:00 AM to 10:00 AM for a fee. Featured amenities include a business center, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. Free self parking is available onsite. Make yourself at home in one of the 20 air-conditioned rooms featuring fireplaces and rooftop private hot tubs. Rooms have private balconies. Kitchens are outfitted with refrigerators, ovens, and stovetops. 55-inch flat-screen televisions with cable programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless internet access keeps you connected.
address: Lighthouse Rd,St. Catherine,South Sinai Governorate,Egypt

name: Star of Dahab Hotel
description: When you stay at Star Of Dahab in Dahab, you'll be on the beach, within a 5-minute drive of Dahab Lagoon and Dahab Beach. This beach hotel is 1.7 mi (2.8 km) from Dahab Bay and 2.1 mi (3.4 km) from Asala Beach. Take in the views from a terrace and a garden and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless internet access. This hotel also features concierge services, a picnic area, and barbecue grills. Satisfy your appetite for lunch or dinner at the hotel's restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the room service (during limited hours). A complimentary continental breakfast is served daily from 7 AM to 11 AM. Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and luggage storage. Guests may use a roundtrip airport shuttle for a surcharge, and free self parking is available onsite. Make yourself at home in one of the 20 guestrooms featuring minibars. Complimentary wireless internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have showers and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include complimentary bottled water and blackout drapes/curtains, and housekeeping is provided daily.
address: Al Mashrabah Street,St. Catherine,South Sinai Governorate,Egypt

name: Nesima Resort
description: When you stay at Nesima Resort in Dahab, you'll be near the beach, within a 5-minute drive of Dahab Beach and Dahab Lagoon. This upscale hotel is 1.8 mi (2.9 km) from Asala Beach and 2 mi (3.2 km) from Dahab Bay. Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages. If you're looking for recreational opportunities, you'll find an outdoor pool and a sauna. This hotel also features complimentary wireless internet access, babysitting (surcharge), and gift shops/newsstands. Satisfy your appetite with international cuisine at Nesima, a restaurant where you can take in the ocean view. Snacks are also available at the coffee shop/cafe. Relax with a refreshing drink from the poolside bar or one of the 2 bars/lounges. A complimentary buffet breakfast is included. Featured amenities include express check-in, express check-out, and luggage storage. For a surcharge, guests may use a roundtrip airport shuttle (available on request) and a cruise ship terminal shuttle. Treat yourself to a stay in one of the 51 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring private plunge pools. Complimentary wireless internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and refrigerators.
address: El Mashraba,St. Catherine,South Sinai Governorate,Egypt

name: Sunrise Dahab Camp
description: Boasting a garden and views of garden, Sunrise Dahab Camp is a sustainable bed and breakfast situated in Dahab, 100 metres from Dahab Beach. Featuring full-day security, this property also provides guests with an outdoor fireplace. The accommodation features a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, a shared kitchen and free WiFi. Some units have a terrace and/or a patio with quiet street views and an outdoor dining area. There is a coffee shop and lounge. Yoga classes and fitness classes are arranged at the fitness room in house. For guests with children, the bed and breakfast offers an indoor play area and a children's playground. Guests at Sunrise Dahab Camp can enjoy darts on-site, or go walking tours or pub crawls in the surroundings. The nearest airport is Sharm el-Sheikh International Airport, 93 km from the accommodation.
address: Lighthouse Road Dahab, Beach Road, Behind Sababa Hotel,St. Catherine,South Sinai Governorate,Egypt

name: Carmine Hotel Dahab
description: Located in Dahab, Carmine Hotel Dahab is connected to a shopping center, a 4-minute drive from Dahab Beach and 6 minutes from Asala Beach. This hotel is 2.6 mi (4.2 km) from Dahab Lagoon and 3.5 mi (5.6 km) from Dahab Bay. Don't miss out on the many recreational opportunities, including an indoor pool, a 24-hour fitness center, and bicycles to rent. This hotel also features complimentary wireless internet access and concierge services. Getting to nearby attractions is a breeze with the area shuttle (surcharge). Enjoy a meal at the restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at the bar/lounge. Featured amenities include express check-out, a 24-hour front desk, and a safe deposit box at the front desk. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and free self parking is available onsite. Make yourself at home in one of the 25 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and minibars. Complimentary wireless internet access is available to keep you connected. Conveniences include desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.
address: Peace Road Behind Ali Baba Hotel and Fighting Kangaroo Camp,St. Catherine,South Sinai Governorate,Egypt

name: Jowhara Hotel
description: When you stay at Jowhara Hotel in St. Catherine, you'll be 6 minutes by car from Saint Catherine's Monastery. Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as bicycles to rent or take in the view from a terrace and a garden. This hotel also features complimentary wireless internet access and concierge services. Enjoy a meal at the restaurant or snacks in the hotel's coffee shop/cafe. A complimentary continental breakfast is served daily from 7:00 AM to 10:00 AM. Featured amenities include dry cleaning/laundry services, a 24-hour front desk, and luggage storage. Make yourself at home in one of the 30 air-conditioned guestrooms. Complimentary wireless internet access is available to keep you connected. Bathrooms have showers and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include ceiling fans, and housekeeping is provided on request.
address: El Mashraba Street,St. Catherine,South Sinai Governorate,Egypt

description: A stay at Neptune Hotel places you in the heart of Dahab, a 1-minute drive from Dahab Beach and 6 minutes from Dahab Lagoon. Make yourself at home in one of the 15 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Your Select Comfort bed comes with Egyptian cotton sheets. name: Club Red Dahab Motel
description: Located close to the public Mashraba beach in Dahab, Club Red Dahab Motel offers air-conditioned rooms with free Wi-Fi with a pool view. It boasts a garden and a terrace. All rooms at Club Red Dahab Motel are furnished with tiled floors. Each comes with a wardrobe and a private bathroom. Some rooms have a balcony and overlook the Bedouin-themed seating area or the sea. Other rooms have a window with a view of the garden. You can enjoy a barbecue by the garden, or request a local excursion from the tour desk. Facilities for water sports such as diving and snorkelling are available.
address: Al Mashraba beside the police point,St. Catherine,South Sinai Governorate,Egypt

name: Oasis Fighting Kangaroo
description: When you stay at Oasis Fighting Kangaroo in Dahab, you'll be near the beach and steps from Dahab Beach. Prepare your meals in the shared/communal kitchen. Complimentary wireless internet access is available to keep you connected. Bathrooms with showers are provided.

name: Mirage Village
description: Mirage Village is a beachfront resort with access to the coral reef of the Red Sea. It has a private beach, free Wi-Fi and a tour desk that can arrange safaris and excursions. The rooms at the Mirage Village are furnished with classic wooden furniture. All rooms are air-conditioned and come with private en suite bathrooms. Every room has a small terrace facing the Mirage Village garden and has a sea view. Mirage Village is situated in Dahab on the beach between the Lighthouse and Eel Garden dive sites and offers views of the Sinai Mountains and the mountains of Saudi Arabia across the Gulf of Aqaba. The restaurant at Mirage Village serves a wide range of fine cuisine and specializes in local dishes and fresh fish barbecue. The hotel has on-site private parking and the Sharm el-Sheikh International Airport is less than 90 km away. The hotel offers transfer to and from the airport in air conditioned minibuses.
address: El Fanar Street,St. Catherine,South Sinai Governorate,Egypt

description: Situated in Dahab, 200 metres from Dahab Beach, New Yalla Hotel features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a terrace. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi. At the hotel, each room is equipped with a wardrobe. Rooms are complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower, all rooms at New Yalla Hotel have a flat-screen TV and air conditioning, and some rooms are fitted with a balcony. At the accommodation the rooms include bed linen and towels. A continental breakfast is available each morning at New Yalla Hotel. The nearest airport is Sharm el-Sheikh International Airport, 93 km from the hotel.

name: Tirana Aqua Park Resort - All Inclusive
description: Property Location With a stay at Tirana Aqua Park Resort - All Inclusive in Sharm el Sheikh (Nabq Bay), you'll be close to Rehana Beach and Jackson Reef. This 4-star resort is within the vicinity of White Lagoon and Dolphina Park.Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 510 air-conditioned guestrooms. Rooms have private balconies. Business, Other Amenities Featured amenities include high-speed (wired) Internet access (surcharge), a business center, and limo/town car service. name: Octopus Hotel
description: This Dahab Resort is situated 100 metres from the beach and benefits from air-conditioned rooms with balconies, an outdoor swimming pool and free Wi-Fi. It specialises in guided diving and other activities including snorkelling and horse riding. The on-site restaurant serves a mixture of Oriental and International cuisine, and there is a large terrace which features communal BBQ facilities. The centre of Dahab with its many restaurants is a 5-minute car drive away. The 24-hour accessible Octopus also offers housekeeping, laundry services and a currency exchange.

name: Domina Aquamarine Resort
description: This luxury hotel caters for a diversity of customers with its international standard facilities and excellent location, offering a relaxed retreat for beach holidaymakers, fun-packed outdoor activities and water sports. Domina Aquamarine Resortâ€˜s Moorish architecture style perfectly integrates with the surrounding beauty of the area. The hotel is only a 2-minute walk from the beach, where you can relax on a sun bed or experience a variety of water sports activities. If you are in the need of an excitement rush, you can of course head to the hotel casino, which is popular in the area. Guests have a variety of dining facilities in the resort to choose from. These include 11 restaurants whose range of offers spreads from buffet to Ã  la carte menu, with dishes from the local, Italian and international traditions. There are also 12 bars, with 5 being located on the pool side. Spacious and comfortable accommodation with a balcony or terrace, all have a sofa/extra bed and a child's crib upon request. The majority of the rooms enjoy an exceptional view of the sea.

name: Bishbishi Camp Dahab
description: This budget hotel is located across the street from the Gulf of Aqaba, a 5-minute walk from central Dahab. It includes a shaded lounge area in the garden and a 24-hour reception. All air-conditioned rooms at The Bishbishi Garden come with wooden furniture and a private bathroom. Most of them have a free Wi-Fi connection as well. Bishbishiâ€™s Ã  la carte restaurant serves breakfast, lunch and dinner indoors or on the palm-lined terrace. Guest can also find a number of local restaurants a 2-minute walk away. A diving centre is situated a 5-minute walk away, and snorkeling equipment can be rented on site. The hotel also offers a laundry service, travel desk and luggage storage room. Airport shuttles can be arranged from any of Egypt's international airports, including Sharm el-Sheikh Airport, 58.4 km away. Free parking is provided.

name: El Khan Sharm Hotel
description: With a stay at El Khan Sharm Hotel in Sharm El Sheikh (El Hadaba), you'll be within a 5-minute drive of Naama Bay and Il Mercato Mall. This spa hotel is 4.9 mi (7.9 km) from Naama Bay Beach and 8.1 mi (13 km) from Domina Coral Bay Congress Centre. Relax at the full-service spa, where you can enjoy massages. Additional features at this hotel include complimentary wireless internet access, shopping on site, and a television in a common area. The complimentary beach shuttle makes getting to the surf and sand a breeze. At El Khan Sharm Hotel, enjoy a satisfying meal at the restaurant. Relax with a refreshing drink at one of the 2 bars/lounges. Buffet breakfasts are available daily from 7:00 AM to 10:00 AM for a fee. Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, luggage storage, and laundry facilities. Free self parking is available onsite. Make yourself at home in one of the 100 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and LED televisions. Satellite television is provided for your entertainment. Bathrooms have showers and hair dryers.
address: sea street ,Um El Seed Cliff El Forsya Street ; Um El Seed cliff,Sharm El Sheikh,South Sinai Governorate,Egypt

name: Logaina Sharm Resort
description: A stay at Logaina Sharm Resort places you in the heart of Sharm El Sheikh, a 5-minute drive from SOHO Square and 6 minutes from Shark's Bay. This beach hotel is 5.5 mi (8.9 km) from Domina Coral Bay Congress Centre and 6.3 mi (10.1 km) from Naama Bay. Spend the day on the private beach or dip into one of the 2 outdoor swimming pools. Additional features at this hotel include complimentary wireless internet access, concierge services, and an arcade/game room. If you'd like to spend the day shopping, you can hop on the shuttle (surcharge). Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's poolside restaurant, which features a garden view. You can also stay in and take advantage of the room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at the beach bar. Featured amenities include a business center, express check-out, and dry cleaning/laundry services. Planning an event in Sharm El Sheikh? This hotel has facilities measuring 1076 square feet (100 square meters), including conference space. A shuttle from the airport to the hotel is provided for a surcharge (available on request), and free self parking is available onsite. Make yourself at home in one of the 58 guestrooms. Complimentary wireless internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include phones, as well as desks and separate sitting areas.
address: Sharks Bay,Sharm El Sheikh,South Sinai Governorate,Egypt

name: Pickalbatros Aqua Park Sharm El Sheikh
description: Pickalbatros Aqua Park Sharm El Sheikh is a unique and luxurious 5-star resort. Our Aqua Park is very popular for its water slides, varied swimming pools, and diverse range of sports and different activities for people of all ages. You will find something for everyone at the Pickalbatros Aqua Park Sharm El Sheikh, whether you are planning an activity holiday or a family vacation combined with a most exquisite theme of water sports and leisure. The hotel comprises 236 rooms including standard rooms and family rooms.

name: Desert View Sharm Hotel
description: With a stay at Desert View Sharm Hotel in Sharm El Sheikh (El Hadaba), you'll be within a 5-minute drive of Il Mercato Mall and Alf Leila Wa Leila. This hotel is 2.1 mi (3.4 km) from Naama Bay and 2.2 mi (3.6 km) from Aqua Blue Water Park. Take in the views from a terrace and a garden and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless internet access. Satisfy your appetite at the hotel's coffee shop/cafe, or stay in and take advantage of the room service (during limited hours). Buffet breakfasts are available daily from 7 AM to 10 AM for a fee. Featured amenities include express check-in, express check-out, and a 24-hour front desk. Free self parking is available onsite. Make yourself at home in one of the 47 guestrooms featuring refrigerators. Satellite television is provided for your entertainment. Bathrooms have bathtubs or showers and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include safes and blackout drapes/curtains, and housekeeping is provided daily.

name: Dahab Paradise
description: Located in Dahab, Dahab Paradise is in the suburbs, a 1-minute drive from Asala Beach and 6 minutes from Ras Abu Galum Nature Reserve. This hotel is 1.9 mi (3.1 km) from Dahab Beach and 3.7 mi (6 km) from Dahab Lagoon. Pamper yourself with onsite massages or enjoy recreation amenities such as an outdoor pool. This hotel also features complimentary wireless internet access and tour/ticket assistance. Enjoy a meal at the restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the hotel's 24-hour room service. Wrap up your day with a drink at the bar/lounge. A complimentary buffet breakfast is served daily from 7:00 AM to 9:30 AM. Featured amenities include a 24-hour front desk, multilingual staff, and laundry facilities. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available 24 hours), and free self parking is available onsite. Make yourself at home in one of the 35 guestrooms featuring refrigerators and minibars. Rooms have private balconies or patios. 35-inch flat-screen televisions are provided, with satellite programming available. Bathrooms with showers are provided.

name: Sababa Hotel
description: Set in Dahab, 200 metres from Dahab Beach, Sababa Hotel offers accommodation with a terrace, free private parking, a restaurant and a bar. The accommodation provides a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, room service and free WiFi. With a private bathroom equipped with a bidet and free toiletries, certain units at the hotel also provide guests with a balcony. At Sababa Hotel every room includes bed linen and towels. Ã€ la carte and continental breakfast options are available every morning at the accommodation. Bike hire and car hire are available at this hotel and the area is popular for cycling. The nearest airport is Sharm el-Sheikh International Airport, 93 km from Sababa Hotel.

Relax with a refreshing drink from the poolside bar or one of the 5 bars/lounges. A complimentary full breakfast is served daily from 7 AM to 10 AM. Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers body treatments. You're sure to appreciate the recreational amenities, which include 2 outdoor swimming pools, a waterslide, and a sauna. Additional amenities at this resort include complimentary wireless internet access, concierge services, and gift shops/newsstands.
